00036 #ifndef HPHOB_TRIADS_HEADER_INCLUDED
00037 #define HPHOB_TRIADS_HEADER_INCLUDED

00039 namespace SimSite3D{
00040 
00041   typedef struct{
00042     residue_type residue;  
00043     atom_type nbr_A;
00044     atom_type B;
00045     atom_type nbr_C;
00046   }hphob_triad_t;
00047   typedef std::map<residue_type, std::map<atom_type, const hphob_triad_t*> > 
00048     hphob_triad_map_t;
00049   typedef std::vector<const hphob_triad_t*> hphob_triad_vec;
00050   typedef hphob_triad_vec::const_iterator hphob_triad_vci;
00051
